title: What is your fashion style? How do you choose clothes?

korean: 주로 청바지에 티셔츠나 니트 입고 다녀요.
검정, 흰색, 회색, 네이비 이런 색들이요.
옷 살 때는 일단 편안한지를 제일 먼저 봐요.
아무리 예뻐도 불편하면 안 입게 되더라고요.
그다음엔 다른 옷이랑 잘 어울리는지 생각해요.
옷장에 있는 옷들이랑 매치하기 쉬운 게 좋거든요.
요즘은 온라인으로도 많이 사는데 후기 꼭 확인해요.
유행보다는 오래 입을 수 있는 옷을 사려고 해요.
english: I like clothes that are comfortable but also look neat, you know.
I mostly wear jeans with a t-shirt or knit.
I prefer basic colors over flashy ones.
Like black, white, gray, navy, those kinds of colors.
When I buy clothes, I first check if they're comfortable.
No matter how pretty they are, if they're uncomfortable, I won't wear them.
Then I think about whether they go well with other clothes.
It's good when they're easy to match with clothes in my closet.
These days I buy a lot online, but I always check the reviews.
Because it's annoying to exchange them if the size doesn't fit.
I try to buy clothes I can wear for a long time rather than following trends.
